title: Bring Out the Characteristics
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>It’s done~. Yep, this one is also cute~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>What’s that, your next live’s poster?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Yeah. Look, Yohako~! Isn’t it as cute as me?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Don’t call me Yohako, it’s Yohane.... To be satisfied with just a cute poster, I guess that shows you still have much more to learn.... Behold, this is the poster Yohane made for Aqours!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Uwah, so eerie!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>At least say it has a profound atmosphere! Look, the pattern here is based on a magic circle. This one is based on medicinal herbs used in mystic arts. This one is from magical tools.... Oh, and this area is filled with the ominous aura of a fallen angel. It’s filled to the brim with fallen angel characteristics!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>....Characteristics.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Kukuku, that’s right! Do you even have anything that shows your characteristics on your poster!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>....Kasumin was naive. Kasumin should put more of my characteristics in like yours, Yohako!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Stop calling me Yohako!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>It’s done! How is it? Kasumin tried to express my miracle lovely being by combining hearts, stars, flowers, ribbons, and many other things♡<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>....It kind of looks like a geometry pattern.... Pretty cool.... Cool enough that I want to adopt that for my own.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Aaaah! It’s not cool, it’s cute~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
